skills.name: DILATE
desc: • Deals random damage to a single target.
• 35% Chance to Extend Negative Effect Duration on the target by 1.
• 35% Chance to inflict Flame on up to 2 random enemies for 3 turns.

skills.name: HEAL DRONE
desc: • Grant Force Shield or Titan Shield to each ally for 1 turn.

skills.name: EXTRAPOLATE
desc: • 35% Chance to increase the duration of all beneficial effects on each ally every turn..
